itunes:title: JUL 27, 2022 - BIDEN REGIME OPENS CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION INTO PRESIDENT TRUMP FOR JAN 6
title: JUL 27, 2022 - BIDEN REGIME OPENS CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION INTO PRESIDENT TRUMP FOR JAN 6
description:
Turning Point USA issued a ‘cease and desist’ letter to ABC News over defamatory statements made by Whoopi Goldberg on ‘The View’ about TPUSA being complicit with neo-nazis. Former President Donald Trump called for sending the National Guard into the most violent criminal neighborhoods in the U.S.. The Biden regime’s Department of Justice opened an investigation into Donald Trump’s actions in the January 6th criminal probe insearch of a crime. The Chinese Communist Party has penetrated the Federal Reserve with a network of foreign agent spies and threatened to kidnap a federal economist. 



Here’s your Daily dose of Human Events with @JackPosobiec

content:encoded:
Turning Point USA issued a ‘cease and desist’ letter to ABC News over defamatory statements made by Whoopi Goldberg on ‘The View’ about TPUSA being complicit with neo-nazis. Former President Donald Trump called for sending the National Guard into the most violent criminal neighborhoods in the U.S.. The Biden regime’s Department of Justice opened an investigation into Donald Trump’s actions in the January 6th criminal probe insearch of a crime.
